properties.description: Please input a folder path as the parameter for this pipeline, and the pipeline will delete files which were last modified more than 30 days ago under the particular folder path.

activities.name: DeleteFiles
activities.description: Connect to your storage account to save the log file.

activities.name: Copy source adls to dest adls

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDsPowerQuery
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryDsPowerQuery

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy data to daily sales table

properties.description: Connect to your source store to delete files.

scriptLines: contact as (emailAddress as string, phoneNumber as string),
contact as (phoneNumber as string, emailAddress as string),
query: 'select max(empid) as maxEmpId from empcache',

sources.name: AzureSqlTableforDataFlow
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTableforDataFlow

sources.name: AzureSqlTable2forDataFlow
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable2forDataFlow
